00035 uint64_t get_ts64() {
00036   static Mutex mutex;
00037   ScopedLock lock(mutex);
00038   HiResTime now;
00039   return ((uint64_t)now.sec * 1000000000LL) + (uint64_t)now.nsec;
00040 }
00041 
00042 bool xtime_add_millis(boost::xtime &xt, uint32_t millis) {
00043   uint64_t nsec = (uint64_t)xt.nsec + ((uint64_t)millis * 1000000LL);
00044   if (nsec > 1000000000LL) {
00045     uint32_t new_secs = xt.sec + (uint32_t)(nsec / 1000000000LL);
00046     if (new_secs < xt.sec)
00047       return false;
00048     xt.sec = new_secs;
00049     xt.nsec = (uint32_t)(nsec % 1000000000LL);
00050   }
00051   else
00052     xt.nsec = nsec;
00053   return true;
00054 }
00055 
00056 bool xtime_sub_millis(boost::xtime &xt, uint32_t millis) {
00057   uint64_t nsec = (uint64_t)millis * 1000000LL;
00058 
00059   if (nsec <= (uint64_t)xt.nsec)
00060     xt.nsec -= (uint32_t)nsec;
00061   else {
00062     uint32_t secs = millis / 1000;
00063     uint32_t rem = (uint32_t)(nsec % 1000000000LL);
00064     if (rem <= (uint32_t)xt.nsec) {
00065       if (secs < xt.sec)
00066         return false;
00067       xt.sec -= secs;
00068       xt.nsec -= rem;
00069     }
00070     else {
00071       secs++;
00072       if (secs < xt.sec)
00073         return false;
00074       xt.sec -= secs;
00075       xt.nsec = 1000000000LL - (rem % xt.nsec);
00076     }
00077   }
00078   return true;
00079 }
00080 
00081 int64_t xtime_diff_millis(boost::xtime &early_xt, boost::xtime &late_xt) {
00082   int64_t total_millis = 0;
00083 
00084   if (early_xt.sec > late_xt.sec)
00085     return 0;
00086 
00087   if (early_xt.sec < late_xt.sec) {
00088     total_millis = (late_xt.sec - (early_xt.sec+1)) * 1000;
00089     total_millis += 1000 - (early_xt.nsec / 1000000);
00090     total_millis += late_xt.nsec / 1000000;
00091   }
00092   else if (early_xt.nsec > late_xt.nsec)
00093     return 0;
00094   else
00095     total_millis = (late_xt.nsec - early_xt.nsec) / 1000000;
00096 
00097   return total_millis;
00098 }

00100 std::ostream &hires_ts(std::ostream &out) {
00101   HiResTime now;
00102   return out << now.sec <<'.'<< setw(9) << setfill('0') << now.nsec;
00103 }
00104 
00105 std::ostream &hires_ts_date(std::ostream &out) {
00106   tm tv;
00107   HiResTime now;
00108   time_t s = now.sec; // using const time_t * is not convenient
00109   gmtime_r(&s, &tv);
00110   return out << tv.tm_year + 1900 <<'-'<< tv.tm_mon + 1 <<'-'<< tv.tm_mday
00111              <<' '<< tv.tm_hour <<':'<< tv.tm_min <<':'<< tv.tm_sec <<'.'
00112              << setw(9) << setfill('0') << now.nsec;
00113 }
